mapper.select: SELECT CTCAE_VER AS ctcaeVer , MEDDRA_SOC AS medDraSoc FROM PCNCTCAE WHERE CTCAE_VER = (SELECT CTCAE_VER FROM AEMSTUDY TS WHERE TS.STUDY_ID = #{studyId}) GROUP BY CTCAE_VER, MEDDRA_SOC

SELECT CTCAE_VER AS ctcaeVer , MEDDRA_CODE AS medDraCode , MEDDRA_SOC AS medDraSoc , TERM AS term , IFNULL(GRADE1, '-') AS grade1 , IFNULL(GRADE2, '-') AS grade2 , IFNULL(GRADE3, '-') AS grade3 , IFNULL(GRADE4, '-') AS grade4 , IFNULL(GRADE5, '-') AS grade5 FROM PCNCTCAE WHERE CTCAE_VER = #{ctcaeVer} AND MEDDRA_CODE = #{medDraCode};
